channel.name: Cooking Channel US
channel.title: Burgers, Brew & 'Que
channel.desc: A burger that originated as an off-menu secret and accidentally became the talk of the town; a beer hall serves a mammoth, pretzel-breaded, deep-fried pork shank; baby back ribs get a spicy, fruity makeover with a homemade guava-habanero glaze.
